t: What is the difference between Sponsored TV and Streaming TV ads?

s: June 28, 2022 - Well, DIRECTV shouldn’t have it. Amazon Fire TV is NOT the name of the TV, it’s just the OS that the TV runs. You have to look for the actual brand/model of the TV and choose that as the brand in Remote Setup of the DIRECTV receiver.
